column4: You could use one of these X drivers that use vesa or vga instead... It's not X properly but firefox will see it as X. I have never tested it. I think that it was something like: xserver-xorg-svgalib but I am not quite sure.

I was refering to xvfb but I mis-remembered it, that's not what you are looking for. Probably you want to try with vesa xorg server, I once saw a vga xorg server on a pxes installation but that's an old history
